additional_notes: The document contains four 'Important Message' forms with varying amounts of handwritten information. Three of the forms have dates and times filled in, and one has a signature. The document has been redacted in some areas, indicated by 'DOJ REDACTION'. The bottom right form has a yellow stamp labeled 'GOVERNMENT EXHIBIT 2-N-R' with associated case information.
